item.title: Working with Boards
item.description:
Introduction

This page describes how to work with Boards in Concrete CMS â€” a powerful feature for displaying dynamic content such as news, events, or articles.

What is a Board?

A Board is a layout system for organizing and presenting dynamic content based on feeds, blocks, and templates.

Key Features

  • Custom display templates
  • Support for dynamic content feeds
  • Drag-and-drop configuration
  • Full access control options

Basic Usage

  1. Navigate to Pages > Boards
  2. Click Create Board
  3. Choose a template and layout
  4. Add one or more feeds (e.g. “Recent News”)
  5. Save the board and embed it using the Board View block

Resources

  • Concrete CMS Documentation
  • Video tutorials on YouTube

Summary

Boards are a great way to manage and present structured dynamic content on your site. They combine design flexibility with centralized content control.
